title: Menikmati malam di pangkal pinang..di menumbing hotel

text: Saya menginap selama 2 mlm pd bulan ramadhan lalu. Saya kurang puas menginap di menumbing krn menu sahur sangat ala kadarnya dan pemanggang roti rusak, remote AC dan TV tidak berfungsi dgn baik, sehingga saya tidak bisa menikmati istirahat di kamar. Kebersihan kamar lumayan tp saya kaget ketika kembali ke kamar jam 12 siang, ternyata kamar blm dibersihkan. Saya memilih tidur siang aja tp baru sebentar tidur siang tiba2 kamar diketuk dan ternyata room service mau membersihkan kamar. Bayangin aja knp harus membersihkan kamar tengah hari dimana waktunya tamu istirahat. Saya kecewa dgn pelayanan secara keseluruhan
title: Kurang puas

text: Bagian resepsionis, lobi dan ruang makan dengan ubin hitam putih seperti papan catur plus dominasi cat putih pada pintu-pintu kacanya menjadikan hotel bergaya kental kolonial ini cantik dan sedap dipandang saat pertama kita tiba. Keluarga besar saya menikmati tinggal di Menumbing Heritage selama berlibur di Pangkal Pinang. Ibu saya suka duduk di sofa besar di lobi yang disirami cahaya matahari melalui pintu-pintu kacanya yang bisa dibuka lebar, ditambah lagi air putih dan jus yang selalu tersedia di situ. Walaupun interior area kamarnya standar, tidak senada dengan dekor bagian depan hotel, itu terbayar dengan lokasi yang dekat ke pasar, kedai makan, aneka toko serta fasum lainnya. Mencari perlengkapan keluarga yang diperlukan selama menginap hingga beli buah sangat mudah, tinggal jalan kaki. Hotel ini memberikan kenyamanan sehingga suasana hiruk pikuk di luar tidak terasa. Fasilitas lain yang jadi pertimbangan saat liburan bersama keluarga adalah kolam renang untuk anak-anak dan... peta tujuan tempat wisata serta kuliner yang dapat diminta di resepsionis. Sepertinya sepele namun penting. Hal yang unik dari hotel ini adalah business center yang begitu homy dan satu-satunya lift berpintu kaca yang dilengkapi sensor. Menumbing Heritage memberikan suasana berbeda saat kita berada di Pangkal Pinang.
title: Hotel Cantik Bergaya Kolonial untuk Keluarga

text: Hotel yang unik, dengan interior seperti hotel zaman belanda. Unik dengan sentuhan klasik yang menarik. Fasilitas hotel yang menarik, Sarapan yang beragam, dan lokasi yang strategis, dekat dengan pusat perbelanjaan dan pasar.

text: kesan pertama lihat hotel menumbing , bagian depan hotel pasar , hotel dikelilingi oleh tembok besar dan tinggi ... tapi setelah masuk kedalam baru terlihat hotelnya . sangat terawat , bersih dan artistik. Hotel ini juga dilengkapi lift , meskipun sederhana tetapi masih bisa membantu tamu untuk naik ke kamarnya.kamar hotelnya bersih meskipun agak gelap, penerangan kurang kalau malam sore. yang lucunya hotel ini suka mati lampu. gak sadar ketika tertidur udara panas sekali. ternyata mati lampu dan ac mati. sehingga kita jadi kepanasan. mgkn bisa dijadikan pertimbangan untuk memperbesar kapasitas listrik sehingga tamu tidak merasa terganggu, karena kami merasakan beberapa kali mati lampu.makanan enak, ada mie ayam, roti panggangnya yum yum .. kolam renang minimalis dan cocok untuk anak2. overall oke .. receptionist siap membantu kapanpun. thanks to menumbing.
title: Nice & Clean Hotel

text: Hotel yang cukup unik. Interiornya, design interiornya, dan furniturenya. Staff-staff nya juga ramah dan sigap membantu. Namun....ada kejadian yang mengganggu kenyamanan saya selama berada di sini. Seorang staff housekeeping melakukan kesalahan, dia memasuki kamar saya... yang seharusnya dia mungkin masuk ke kamar sebelah untuk bersih-bersih tapi dia malah masuk ke kamar saya. Benar-benar di luar dugaan saya tiba-tiba pintu kamar terbuka lebar dan seorang staff hotel tampak berdiri di pintu. Selang sepersekian detik dia menutup pintu kembali. Karena ketidaknyamanan tersebut saya memutuskan untuk tidak memperpanjang waktu saya untuk tinggal di hotel ini. Padahal tadinya saya bermaksud untuk memperpanjang hingga 2-3 hari ke depan. Saya harap lain kali untuk berhati-hati kepada seluruh staff hotel, dan lebih teliti lagi mengecek kamar mana yang seharusnya dia masuki dan bersihkan.
title: Hotel yang menarik, tapi...

text: Bekas benteng jaman perang indonesia. Yang disulap menjadi hotel yang unik. Didalamnya ada elevator unik yang akan buat kita kaget. Terdapat kolam renang bersih. Harga yang masi ramah kantong. Menu sarapan paginya jg bervariasi dan enak2. Pengalaman yang menyenangkan
title: Hotel dengan design yang unik

text: Hotel posisinya cukup strategis, berada di belakang pusat perbelanjaan, penilaian untuk pelayan yang ramah adalah benar, kamar yang ditata dengan baik seperti mulia hotel Jakarta, hanya saja ini versi middle low nya, resto dengan live musicnya sangat menghibur,  lahan parkir cukup luas dan lobby serta ruang pertmuan yang cukup menarik memberikan kesan menyenangkan, hanya saja kamar kurang kedap suara, kolam renang masih kurang pencahayaan di waktu malam, mungkin bisa ditambahkan, selain itu saya kesulitan menggeser tirai jendela untuk memaksimalkan suasana, serta pilihan menu sarapan yang terbatas, meskipun begitu  ada 3 makanan rekomendasi saya untuk hotel ini, mie bangka,  Roti Bakar Nanas jangan lupa request extra keju, dan satu lagi jus nanas, resto di pinggir kolam renang adalah nilai plus. untuk melihat keseluruhan dari hotel ini bisa di lihat di playlist saya di youtube Alfalegro Jalan Jalan
title: Makanannya enak,

text: saya menginap 1 malam 2 kamar bersama rekan saya....tampilan pertama sangat terkesan..proses check in cepat hanya saja welcome drink tidak bisa kami nikmatin karena menunggu gelas bersih tersedia 15 menit tidak kunjung datang dari pihak resto sedangkan kami keburu harus pergi....kamar ok, breakfast ok..variasi menu tidak banyak tapi kualitas rasa OK.....yang paling menyenangkan adalah suasana hotel yang asri, tenang.....walaupun terletak di dekat pasar namun sangat recomended buat kembali menginap di hotel ini....tidak mengecewakan....

text:
Menyandang sebagai warisan budaya, hotel ini cukup memberikan kesan tersendiri, Mungkin karena beban Heritage ini, maka bila anda berada di dalam kamar, maka anda akan dapat dengan jelas mendengar pembicaraan mereka yang ada di lorong kamar. Yang pasti bila anda membayangkan kamar yang kedap suara, maka anda tidak akan dapatkan di hotel ini. Ruang makan yang terbuka dan berdekatan dengan kolam renang membuat kesan tersendiri. Alunan lagu lama Lobo ikut memberikan nuansa berbeda. Lift yang unik juga akan anda dapatkan di hotel heritage ini.
Namun karena lokasinya yang jadi satu dengan pasar, maka untuk bisa keluar hotel ini dengan membawa kendaraan diperlukan waktu yang agak lama.
Oh ya ada satu pengalaman yang kurang enak ketika saya menginap tanggal 3 Juni Kemarin. Kamar 206 yang diperuntukkan buat saya, ketika sama masuk, ternyata di dalamnya masih ada penghuni lain.......ini sangat embarrassing, terutama untuk hotel yang menyandang bintang 4.

text: Long weekend ini saya dan keluarga staycation di hotel ini. Mengapa nginap disini? Hotelnya unik dan bagi yang suka vintage ini hotel yang tepat. Desainnya instragamable atau pathable dalam artian sungguh memanjakan mata. text: Hotel ini tertata cantik dan rapi. Kabarnya hotel ini bersejarah karena dulunya adalah markas militer Belanda. Pada salah satu dinding depan hotel ini, tak jauh dari ruang resepsionis, ada tulisan yang menjelaskan sejarah hotel ini. Akan tetapi, tidak tampak kesan kuno yang otentik di sini. Semuanya tampak baru. Bangunannya juga, meski terlihat adanya usaha untuk membuat hotel ini terlihat kuno, seperti misalnya telepon model lama yang dipajang di ruangan semacam perpustakaan di sebelah ruang penerimaan tamu. Kamar yang saya tempati adalah kamar biasa yang tidak luas tetapi tata ruangnya cukup baik sehingga terasa nyaman dan menyenangkan. Taman di hotel ini ditata dengan baik dan rapi sehingga terkesan asri. Makan pagi di sini biasa saja, tidak ada yang istimewa. Yang jelas bukan kelas bintang empat atau lima. Untungnya ada satu dua hidangan yang kebetulan saya suka. Mi bangka di sini terasa lain dan agak hambar, tidak seperti mi bangka yang biasa saya makan di Jakarta. Tetapi mi hotel tentu lain dari mi yang dijual di kaki lima atau di rumah makan biasa.  Pelayan di sini cukup ramah dan membantu. Kolam renang di belakang ruang makan tertata apik dan asri dan mengundang orang untuk berenang. Kebersihan hotel ini terjaga dengan baik. Koneksi internet gratis dan cukup baik. Lokasi hotel ini juga relatif dekat dengan pusat keramaian kota. Meski layanan di hotel ini tidak seprofesional hotel berbintang, hotel ini cukup menyenangkan untuk ditinggali.
title: Cantik, tertata rapi tapi tidak terkesan bersejarah

text: Sekilas tampak luar hotel ini mirip benteng, fasad depan tidak terlihat susunan jendela kamar seperti hotel pada umumnya, yg ada cuma tembok tinggi. Begitu masuk halaman, tampak teras lobi, taman asri, semua bersih dan enak dilihat. Bangunan hotel mirip bangunan era kolonial, tiang besar, jendela banyak, semua serba putih. Lobi, ruang tunggu di buat seperti gallery, ada foto dari jaman dulu. Untuk naik ke lantai atas bisa menggunakan tangga yg terbuat dari kayu atau bisa juga menggunakan lift. Suasana kamar deluxe justru konsep modern, ukuran kamar cukup luas, sayang tidak tersedia handuk cuci tangan. Menu makan direstoran variatif, ruangannya tertata rapi, indoor dan outdoor. text: Pertama saya ke Bangka, Saya book online hotel ini dan hanya tahu dari review nya saja. ketika sampai di dekat hotel, dalam hati saya cukup kecewa karena pagar luar hotel seperti hotel kelas melati dan saya pikir saya salah booking, namun ketika saya memasuki pintu gerbang dan tiba di depan lobby hotel ternyata saya salah, saya telah benar booking hotel ini. kesan pertama melihat hotel dari dalam yakni seperti museum, bangunan kolonial dan seperti bangunan bersejarah yang bersih, elegan dan benar-benar membuat kagum. semua interior bangunan dan arsitekturnya menawan, staff hotel dan dua reseptionist perempuan sangat ramah, suasana di hotel seperti di rumah, resepsionis sangat membantu saya tentang informasi di bangka. kamar di menumbing heritage ini sangat nyaman, bersih dan kamar mandi nya juga bersih. breakfast nya terletak di cafe menumbing samping hotel, suasananya keren dengan view kolam renang, makanannya pun enak-enak. tidak ada pengalaman buruk selama saya menginap disini. dan mungkin saya akan kembali lagi kesini.
title: Hotel yang mengagumkan

text: ketika di depan hotel rasanya gak ingin menginap di sini, tapi setelah memasuki areal hotel seluruh penilaian berubah. bangunan tua ini disulap menjadi hotel yang nyaman dengan desain interior yang indah sekali. staf yang ramah, makanan yang enak banget apalagi selai nanas dan jus nanasnya. saya ingin kembali lagi ke hotel ini
title: heritage hotel

text: Lokasinya di dekat pasar, gampang cari oleh2 & makanan. Di area resepsionis kadang tercium aroma pasarnya. Kamar bersih, resepsionis & waiter waitress di cafe ramah & informatif. Breakfast ok, hanya di hari lebaran kedua lebih ramai, sehingga pelayanan lebih lama. Overall, recommended to stay here
title: Nice heritage hotel

text: Perjalanan mendatangi sebuah tempat baru jadi begitu mengesankan ketika menemui kebetulan-kebetulan yang menyenangkan. Salah satunya adalah ketika memilih Menumbing Heritage Hotel. Hasil jelajah dunia maya entah mengapa begitu melihat 'gallery' dalam situs resminya langsung membuat jatuh hati. Tanpa pikir pjg lgsg booking secara online. Begitu tiba di tempat, Sambutan & layanan ramah langsung menyapa dengan hangat. Benar-benar 2 malam yang mengesankan!
title: Kenyamanan dalam sejarah Bangka

text:
heritage hotel
first hotel in bangka
good service but the lift old ones
near ramayana,traditional market as well
recommended if you visit bangka island
good breakfast also but from outside cannot see hotel
title: Short escape

photos.caption:
heritage hotel
first hotel in bangka

text:
Hotel is located in the market area. Hotel building is very old, but the room is very nice and clean. I stayed at the signature suite, the room is not very large, but it is comfortable. The bath room is quite large with a complete amenities. Room does not have any windows, this is one of the minus points. There a bath tub in the room, located out side the bath room.
Breakfast is good. Service is good. Staffs are very friendly and helpful. Location is in the central area.
title: Old Hotel with a beautiful face...

text: The hotel is located near traditional market and really near catholic church which is good for me. Really friendly staff. Cheap price for excellent service. Nice room, nice breakfast, nice interior. Not really clean, but its really nice 😊
title: Nice hotel

text:
We loved the design and the friendly and caring staff. The food in the restaurant was good, breakfast was average. After 9.00 some items ran out.

In the weekend the pool is open to non guests, what means 40 people in and around it. Although we got great service to show us the route to the beach, we thought it was too far and moved to another place. (30 min on scooter)

I recommend this hotel if you need to go to the city a few days. For a week of holiday i would find something on walking distance to the beach.
title: Beautifull hotel, location was not so great

text: The hotel itself is very nice, it has classic feeling, very cozy and quiet. The downside is the location, since it is located in the middle of a traditional market that is very crowded in the morning and quite creepy at night
title: Nice classic hotel

text:
I was staying here for a short trip. The location of this hotel is really good because it is located in the city center. The service of the staffs were awesome! I would give them 5 stars for the services. They were all very friendly and helpful.

Size of the room is average. Unfortunately the size of the bathroom is quite small for me but they have a rain shower, which is good. 

If you wish to stay in a homey feel like hotel and aim for a good location, then this hotel is for you.
title: Feels Like Home

text: Went to stay at this hotel after a couple of times visiting this island. I tried chain hotel here but the service was not as good as this. We paid less but I got more. I did not know that there was a nice hotel like this although location wise was just next to wet market. I booked a superior room but got junior suite. The room was fine. The staff were friendly. Breakfast was fine. The building was indeed like a heritage house but clean and well maintained. I have only one input: can you please use hard mattras that support my spine ? I do not have any other complaint or input for the price  paid. I  definitely will recommend to any one to stay at this hotel whenever they visit this island. Kudos Menumbing Heritage Hotel!. all the best!!
title: Excellent Hotel in this island

text:
We choose to stay at This hotel, as this hotel is good from the reviewer, its near to the city center, and its have vintage docoration outside the room. 

The superior twin room size is not too big, but sufficient if you bring 1 medium size suitcase or 2 cabin size suitcase.

Room and bathroom are clean, they provide refreshment ad well as mineral water and teh kotak for complimentary 

Breakfast buffet menu served american breakfast, indonesian breakfast and local specialfood such as mie bangka/ noodle, roti panggang/bread

The staffs are helpfull.

The only thing need to be improved is the pool. The water is not as clean as in the picture.
title: Vintage Hotel in the city center

text:
The hotel is very beautifully restored and I love the service of the people here. The location right in the middle of the market in Pangkal Pinang city so can be a bit noisy i the morning to late afternoon and the surrounding seems dirty but once you are inside of the hotel everything is the other way around. 

I also love the location so at night time I can walk to the famous road there for Ase otak2, tofu sui, Anggrek restaurant, etc. 

The breakfast is very good, though selection is not much but tasty! Try their baked bread and mie Bangka with homemade soy milk. I ate so much till I gain weight! Lucky it's a buffet otherwise I need to spend so much money on breakfast! The room also come with free minibar (2 small box of Teh Kotak) :)

The negative point of the hotel :
1. Superior room is very small with small bathroom and once you shower, the water spill all over the bathroom.
2. Refill of the breakfast need to speed up, seems like you  have to always ask for refill. Like on 1st day, they run out of mie Bangka.

These negative point however did not really bother me, so I will definitely will recommend this hotel and will be come back to stay if I happen to be visit Bangka again.
title: Love this hotel !

text:
This hotel captivated me and my friends' attention when we had to find hotels to stay in after company outing.

This hotel was used as a fort back in the day, but now they had transformed it into a chic and monochromatic hotel. I fell in love with how sleek the hotel looks, and the minimalistic interior just compliments it.

The ambient was pretty nice in the dining and pool area, also, the room was cosy. The food was delicious, and the staffs are really helpful and friendly. Also, when I stayed in, we got free flow of soft drinks, so that is a plus (totally made me save a bit of money should I want some soda).

The only downside was the size of the shower area. As I am a bit of a thick girl, it does take a bit of manuver to navigate the shower. But other than that, I'm pretty happy with my room.

Will definitely stay in here again should I visit Bangka again.
title: Beautiful hotel in the middle of the city

text: Stayed there for only 1 night, upgraded to junior suite. The staff was very friendly, really make my day. The ambiance of the common area was beyond expectation. The room was okay, but they use old style window, so no soundproof. Early morning market was very noisy. Minibar was free. The breakfast was so so, but the Bangka Noodle was delicious. Bad coffee... Luckily I bring my own VELOCE Coffee, and asked the kind barista to make it for me to start my day. Keep up the friendly experience!
title: Exotic hotel in the middle of the city

text: Menumbing is hotel with old style,  but its so nice place.  Near to everywhere. Friendly staff, very helpful. But you must check out early. I used to be check out  at 01 pm, when I have stayed at another hotel. But overall it's nice place to live.
title: Amazing hotel

text: The hotel is located in downtown of Pangkal Pinang. Near to the traditional market and Catedral of Pangkal Pinang. According to the information as written on the wall of the hotel, it was built at 1900 by Captain Phang Tjong Tjhoen, a respected leaderof the local Chinese community. It was used by militarry District Commando Base at 1960 and in 1980 take over to the hotel again. I am very enjoy stay there. It was feel like at home. The breafast is good, the room is comfortable.
title: Old Hotel but Amazing

text:
This hotel got my attention when I saw the pictures on my friend's feed on instagram. upon arrival, I love the mural stating the history on the front wall, the cleanliness, the warm welcome from the hotel staff, 

everything was almost perfect, until i got to the room. I thought the room would be as "modern" as its lobby (the tile, the white wall etc) but the room is dull. the bed i think they use a 2nd hand bed (from my assumption) the lighting is too dark, the hall way is dump. 

there are ants coming from the little hole on the toilet tile near the door. 

I still enjoy my staying though, but it could have been better
title: Almost perfect but

text: The hotel is in the market behind the Ramayana Dept Store. At first I thought it's a very small hotel. But when you came in (because we arrived here at night) it was beautiful. white building with many lights. The staffs are very nice. The taste of the restaurant also ok. Because it's near the market so we can easily walk to look for things.
title: Unique hotel

text: Menumbing hotel uses an ex military building. The room is quite small but in good maintainance and clean enough. The outside facade, the wooden staircase are some parts of the original building which well kept. The restaurant/cafe is in new building that very harmonized built to the origin building. The restaurant serve a buffet breakfast in medium choices. The taste is nice. The only elevator in the hotel is none the like in the world. It is next to the old market (pasar) where we can find delicious of traditional fusion cuisine in street food vendor by local people. The service and staff are good too.
title: nice vintage hotel in pangkalpinang bangka

text:
Menumbing Heritage Hotel was quite a nice peaceful hotel to stay in.  We had an enjoyable rest here and woke up feeling refreshed.  

The hotel room was nice and clean.  The showers could be improved.  It was very small.  

The breakfast at this hotel was delicious.  We enjoyed the Mie Bangka the most.  

Overall I would recommend people to stay here.  

This place is quite close to some delicious noodle shops (bakmi asu) and a Ramayana supermarket.  Theres also a lot of random shops right outside the hotel that opens up early in the morning.
title: Nice Pleasant Stay

owner_response.text:
Dear Valued Guest,

Thank you for your stay with us. We hope you have a wondeful stay with us and a great experience in Bangka.

Do visit us again whenever you are in Bangka Island.

Cheers,

Derrick
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
This hotel looks like a 5 star place when you first go in, but there were some things off - the room had a mildew scent, problems with the drain in the shower, etc. - but overall it is really nice and you do get a feel like you're staying in a truly luxurious place. Although you could walk right past it without noticing, once you're in it really stands out in the town, and specifically in contrast to the markets and bus terminal surrounding it.
Breakfast isn't special, staying at a hotel this price in Jakarta or elsewhere in Indonesia I would expect something more. Pool is unusual for having a deep end (I think 2.5 meters), but otherwise nothing exceptional either to be honest.
title: Great atmosphere, pleasant stay.

owner_response.text:
Dear Valued Guest,

Thank you for staying with us. 

We are sorry that you experience some problems on your stay. We are working to remedy the situation and addressing the shower and the scent in the room. 

We will work on the breakfast part better as well to better the guest experience.

We appreciate your review and comments. 

Regards,

Derrick 
General Manager

text: The gate made it look like a prison, but then I could see the classic white exterior and interior of the hotel. The elevator was quite unusual, but it's OK. The room and amenities is better than I expected. You even get complimentary soda in the fridge. It has a swimming pool. The food for breakfast is quite good.
title: More than I expected

owner_response.text:

Hope to see you again soon.

Derrick
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
I was arrived at the hotel at 11am, even we cannot early check in at the hotel but still they offer us to keep our belongings and we can continue our trip without waiting until check in hour ,they inform will contact us soon as possible as the room we booked are ready.  
Back then, one of the staff was assist us to our room and explaining how to use their lift which is quite unique..
I found the staffs was also helpfull,  I was planning to go to belitung island on the next day, but we heard that the ship ticket was already sold, we ask for help by the front office to searching any travel agent that selling the ticket, then  help us to booked. Although later they inform cannot help us to booked the ticket, ( because it sold everywhere ) but still they give us a detail information about the possibility to purchase the ticket directly in harbour next morning.. 
Room was convenient & not noisy although the location in front of a local market. Room are clean & tidy, clean bathroom, Breakfast was good, they served many kinds of food ( nasi goreng, bread, salad, etc), and they have a great pool next to the restaurant.
Definitely will be a first choice of hotel whenever i back to bangka
title: Very pleasant stay

owner_response.text:
Dear Valued Guest,

Thank you for a wonderful review of our hotel. We are delighted of the great experience you are having while staying with us.

Do visit us again whenever you are in Bangka Island.

Regards,

Derrick
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: We went to Menumbing from 29april till 4th of May 2016. We had a standard room which has just about all space and things which you need as you're usually outside anyway. The hotel has lots of nice and very friendly personell so they really take care of things in a fast way. The garden, the pool, the breakfast/dining area, and the rest of the hotel are very clean and well taken care off. The food is very good as well and prices are very friendly. Just outside the hotel you step into the Bangka citylife full of Markets and you will find supermarket & KFC within 3mins walking distance. I would really consider this hotel the best in Bangka from a location and quality/price perspective so would recommend it to everybody.
title: Great authentic hotel in city center

text: This a truly beautiful hotel in the heart of Pangkalpinang City.  Great design has maintained the original architecture and yet allowed the construction of a modern, luxury hotel.  The staff are kind, fiendly and very helpful.  The bar/restaurant provides a great ambience if a somewhat limited menu.
title: A true hidden gem

text: Went to Pangkal Pinang to spend a weekend, and glad we picked Menumbing Hotels. Great location, it's about 15 minutes from airport. The staff were polite, helpful and professional. Room was clean and bed was comfortable. This hotels served a lot of great selection during breakfast including mie bangka. Pineapple juice was freshly squeezed, not from box. Great price too. Thank you Menumbing for great experience.
title: 4 star hotel at 3 star price. Very affordable!

Room price is cheap for the service we get. And the room price is include breakfast, breakfast buffet is awesome, a lot of variation and delicious. I will stay here again when I visit Bangka

text: The hotel is a beautiful preserved historical building but it doesn't give you the old building feeling.  I was surprised with the price, it's a budget hotel pricing but I was wowed when I arrived.  The room is beautiful and clean and the bed is so comfortable.  In my mind, I am saying Yes, I am paying a budget hotel price for this nice room.  The staffs are friendly and always ready to help you.  The hotel is located in the heart of the city.  Oh, the price that I pay included breakfast and the breakfast buffet is awesome.  There are variety Indonesian foods which kept my tummy happy until lunch time.  I will stay here again next time I am in Bangka.  Very affordable!

text:
Newly renovated hotel is awesome.  Great location and great service.  
First time staying at this hotel was 20 over years ago and I have returned with new face and I love it.

Airport transfer was prompt. It is about 10 minutes from the airport to hotel with no traffic jam.

Check in was smooth. Room was adequate.  Bed is comfortable.  Bath room is small. All are clean. 

Breakfast was adequate. Swimming pool was big. There is no in house gym. 

The hotel is nearby a Catholic Cathedral of Pangkalpinang.  

I will return to this property for my next stay.

Room was okay but the toilet was so small especially for foreigner.
Restaurant service also was nice. The pool is next to tge restaurant. The pool was so clean n clear.

So this hotel is very recommended hotel if you go to pangkal pinang.

text: The Menumbing Heritage Hotel is situated in a historic building in the center of Pangkal Pinang on Bangka. There's not much to do on Bangka, but if you're there anyways, definitely go to this hotel. Rooms had a good size, but the bathroom was too small, especially for a 200cm tall man (toilet under the towel rack and behind the bathroom door). But that was about the only problem. The beds are good, breakfast is ok and the staff was extraordinarily friendly and helpful. I'm not sure if I will go to Bangka again, but if so, I would definitely choose the Menumbing Heritage Hotel again.
title: Clean and quiet hotel in historic building

text: Newly renovated hotel,friendly stuff,yummy breakfast. I like the hotel is close to local market ,like nostalgia back to the olden days.For whoever enjoy the simplicity in life will enjoy the hotel treatment.
title: pleasant stay.

text:
I was here sometime in july. I was quite suprised when I arrived at the hotel. A little Gem in a small town! Here's my highlight:
- Staff were all pleasant and helpfull
- the room was a good size and clean
- We dine in couple of times and the foods were delish!
- Certainly helps with clean swimming pool. My kids loved it!
- Very close to the local market, you can walk to go there pretty much.
- Loving all the Colonial design of the hotels and it has this 'peacefulness' feeling. 
If I have a chance to go to Bangka Island again, I will certainly stay at this hotel again.
title: Place to relax with a style!

photos.caption: my afternoon snack, ice cream with grass jelly cappucino

text: This hotel quite comfortable, the receptionist quite helpful, and this hotel has elevator :) . There was welcome drink (taste like orange juice and cold mineral water), the hotel is near a school and local market. But quite dark when night, and good place for rest cuz quite quiet. When we check out and ask them to drive us to the airport, they were so pleased drove us. And it was free !! Money can't lie :))
title: Re-build hotel

text:
Unexpectedly located in the middle of hustle and bustle of the local market. Just ask Ramayana and it is located right behind it.

An old police station turned to hotel, it is 3 months old when I visited and all facilities working just fine.

Just like everywhere be aware of plenty of mosquitoes in the room. The housekeeper will gladly spray Baygone for you.

Breakfast is splendid. Small but complete. Local food station is amazing. Their pineapple juice is to die for.

Amazing service all the way through.

We only hope that the hotel keeps the quality for the years to come as many Indonesian hotels deteriorate as the time passes by.
title: Awesome hotel

text: This hotel was surprisingly beautiful and better to be seen rather than looking at the photos. Being inside this hotel feels like transformed into an old Dutch era, we can feel the colonial atmosphere. Classic but relaxing. The dining area was very spacious and the chandeliers also unique.
title: Surprisingly beautiful!

text:
As we like to experience the local culture, we just walk outside the hotel and you can find traditional local market, wholesale markets, restaurants, etc. The location is convenience and everything is within local walking distance. We stayed at the Deluxe Room and the bed was very comfortable & clean. Note: this is a queen bed & if you are a  couple used to king bed or family with kids, you probably want to look at different room.

The staff were wonderful and most importantly professional and knowledgeable as well. Do ask them about local restaurants, sightseeing, etc. We loved the free breakfast buffet...it was delicious, fresh and quality food. We got to know locally grown coffee... simply very good & aromatic, as well as homemade pineapple jam. We also tried dinner at the restaurant and it did not disappoint us....try the 'Bangka Bay Bouillabaisse' and 'Nasi Culture Royale'. Highly recommended.         

There are great many histories in this hotel. If you are into architectural, this is a great colonial hotel to explore as they preserved many histories and treated it respectfully. Do ask the staff to give you an educational tour of the hotel.
title: Great Location, Hospitality, and Heritage

text:
Newly open and well reconstructed, this hotel is tastefully decorated in timeless elegant touch. Am amazed on how they maintain their hundred years old tiles, simply beautiful.
As a solo traveler i was totally at ease there, the sleep quality was good, the room were comfy and clean, early in the morning i slightly hear the church's bell rung which remind me of my Europe trip back in years. The staff are lovely and friendly. Overall i have experienced the finest and the details effort. I am glad that i chosen this hotel over the other one.
Tips, forget not to try 'nasi goreng menumbing' ask the staff to show you best 'martabak bangka jaya?' And the locale kopi tiam
title: Weekend getaway

text: Amazing resort in the middle of the city! Really peacefull and with a great swimming pool. The rooms looked well maintained and clean. Especially, the breakfast was good. They offered waffles, hot food and fruits.
title: Best resort to relax!

text: We love markets of Southeast Asia but we don’t usually go for hotels next to them because they are often not so great. So when I saw the location of the hotel, right next to the central market of Pangkal Pinang, I told myself not to expect too much. But how surprisingly delightful this hotel turned out to be- clean, classy and tastefully decorated with heritage furniture and all. The service was fantastic and food at the poolside restaurant was really good! Wake up for breakfast if you stay here! And do stay here if you have the chance!
title: A very, very pleasant surprise

owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
It is a well preserved hotel in the middle of the city. They’re well aware of the instagram/travel blog effects so there are many Instagram-able spots all over the property. Note that this is not a hotel with authentic antiques like Hotel Majapahit in Surabaya or Tugu in Malang, so architecture and history buffs, beware. Like I said before, the furniture and ambiance are designed for good instagram pictures.

Staff are friendly and helpful. They took time to talk to talk to guests and gives  good recommendations, and I observed this with reception and restaurant staff alike. I had packages delivered to the hotel and the staff took care of them smoothly. Their hospitality is much appreciated.

The room is tiny but well stocked. There were coffee/tea station with electric kettle, free bottled water and cold teh kotak (in the fridge), and complete toiletries. The bed was comfortable, extensive selection of TV channels and stable wifi connection. The bathroom was cramped due to a separate shower box taking most of the space. I would recommend to take off the box entirely because it’s so hard to manuever in it and water keep seeping through the door anyway. 

I’ll recommend this hotel to those who want to try non-chain hotels. The service was great it’ll make up for the tiny room.
title: Beautiful hotel, great service but small room

owner_response.text:
Dear
Renata

Firstly we would like to thank for visiting us at Menumbing Heritage Hotel Pangkalpinang Bangka and for your feedback.We apologize for the inconvenience  of the bathroom space. we still consider to redesigned of the Shower box.
It is my hope that we get the opportunity to welcome you back in the near future.
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
a good hotel in a classic Dutch style, a cozy lobby with a fireplace atmosphere. but a little creepy at night, because there are white kebaya clothes framed with translucent glass and displayed along the corridor near the elevator.

old wooden stairs with lots of mirrors attached to the wall as long as you want to go to the corridor of the room, maybe for some people who like mystical things can stay in this hotel.

but everything paid off with friendly service, a rather large swimming pool, a minimalist but tasty breakfast, a unique restaurant
title: Vintage Hotel but Little Bit Spooky

text:
A very attractive hotel, with many beautiful spots inside. Took Junior Suite, room was quite big. Breakfast has adequate variety and some quite interesting local specialty.

Service was good and friendly, but had a glitch upon check in where we already paid full by bank transfer and also already emailed the proof to their reservation and front office emails 2 days prior to our arrival, but reception staff seemed unsure and said will check again.

Cleanliness of towel needs improvement, and housekeeping forgot to refill our toilet paper & bottled mineral water in the bathroom on the second day (first day upon check in, had bottled mineral water both in the bathroom & room). Room has coffee machine, but hotel was out of coffee capsules.

Hotel needs to pay more attention to details in some areas. But I love this hotel and will definitely come back when visiting Pangkal Pinang.
title: The Devil is in the Details

text: This heritage hotel is from old building. Nice interior especially lobby, mezzanine and pool area. Building is well maintained, high ceiling, bright light. The staff is super friendly - especially front office staff. They have old lift - interesting to try. Just next to the hotel there is local market - a little bit smelly since they sell dried fish, but interesting to be explored and the catholic church. Breakfast is average, actually can be improved with more unique concept and taste, room is nice but frankly speaking - they need to refresh the towel supply. However overall, I think this hotel is a must visit hotel in Bangka.
title: Unique and Friendly hotel in Bangka

I stayed here 2 nights. It is located in the center of the city, and also near our uncle's house. The hotel was very cozy with its heritage building. I love the entrance door of the lobby (or waiting room?). Very good interior and so instagrammable :D. The room was a bit small because we booked for a superior room. The breakfast was nice. I like their roti bakar.

The minus points are: 
- their internal communication was bad because I was asked to pay full amount although I had paid half of the payment in advance. It was confusing. Their reason was because their accounting was absent :/ 
-we had to pay deposit 200K for a hairdryer. 

But overall, it is recommended to stay at this hotel. Use your garuda boarding pass for 50% discount!

text: This is an old hotel which was just renovated. The architecture is very unique. It still give you a heritage feeling but doesn't creepy at all. The staffs were really nice and helpful. It has swimming pool and restaurant by its side. There are lot (i mean, a lot!) of food choices for breakfast. The room is comfortable, i think a lot of stuffs were new so we had no trouble with our room at all. Wifi and cable tv were good. I booked this room with an affordable price and it was really beyond my expectation.
title: Old outside but modern inside

text: It was a good two nights stay at  Menumbing Heritage. The hotel is located in the central of the old business area of the city. Next to the hotel is the Cathedral of Roman Catholic, Diocese of Pangkalpinang. Both hotel and the Cathedral are considered heritage buildings which come years and years ago. Apart from the bathroom which little bit small (in my room-but it’s clean), overall I got nice experience and feeling staying in the hotel. Start from the receptionist, lobby area and all the way to the room the hotel gives different kind of sensation as you go. The furnitures, the stairs (if you going up by stairs), the windows, doors, photos on the wall (simple caption on each photos would definetely add more sensation), the lift (you should try the lift), and finally the room which is clean and cozy. Most importantly the staff who are all very nice and helpfull. Given to its location, It was easy to get to anywhere from the hotel as it is located really in the central of Pangkalpinang city. People said parking is bit small but i dont think it  was really an issue ad the staff woukd always be able to help. And Blue bird taksi is available in Pangkalpinang. Thank you for having me staying at Menumbing heritage, I look forward to come back. Hopefully for more experience .
title: Thanks for the hospitality!

text:
this hotel is located in the middle of the city; very close to the wet market, shopping center and places of worship (church). It wiill be crowded during the day, but very quiet and dark at night.

the building is newly renovated with historical luxury design. the most unique is its elevator, the old-fashioned elevator but still works well.

love the room condition, the ambience and the service. but have problem with the space of the toilet. the size of the toilet is quite small, and the shower area is very limited.
closet very close to the wall, and a bit difficult for my husband (whose body is big) to sit on the closet.
title: Heritage Hotel

text:
Authentic and first class hotel in the middle of Pankalpinang. Garuda cancelled our flight so we arrived at the hotel one day later as per our reservation. Hotel management was great and very professional to resolve this when we informed them about our delay. Yacob at the reception was great and helped us organize a trip to Muntok to see the real Menumbing (the resort where the Dutch kept president Soekarno and vice president Hatta during the revolution). He also helped us to visit the Bangka Tin Winning (BTW) company where my grandfather worked before WWII. Very emotional to hear about the Bangka Massacre and the realization that my family survived all of this. Back in the hotel we enjoyed the large swimming pool, the restaurant and service provided by a competent and friendly staff. 

The room was adequate but a bit too small. Would highly recommend spending a bit more for some more space (especially the bathroom). Also, the restaurant was out of beer which was an unexpected issue, however, they resolved this by serving beer in cans...

For real Bangka snacks (fish cakes) we recommend restaurant Ase not too far away from the hotel. Also, shopping for Bangka batik is a must.
title: Authentic and first class hotel

text:
Centrally located. Close to the airport, about 15-20min cab ride. Attentive Staff. Fast and efficient check-in/out. Fast wifi. Spacious rooms. Comfortable beds and pillows. A greeting with my name in the bedroom. 
Its a beautiful preserved historical building but it doesn't give you that old building feeling. Colonial style interior, amazing. Free softdrinks in the room. Breakfast menu is varied. Its close to local market.
title: Heritage Hotel with a Modern Twist

text:
Hidden gem which located in unexpected area [just opposite wet market], easy to reach by minibus "angkot" as the terminal is only at walking distance.

Well renovated historic building with extension of additional floors + rooms, which not affect its value [FYI; they have cozy yet elegant library at 1st floor with few interesting historic and knowledge books].

Helpful, friendly staffs are ready and alert to your request.
Reasonable room sizes with comfy bed, free WiFi, local + international TV channel, complimentary drinks, toiletries are available [they even provide shaving kit for man] 
Small defect were at the restaurant for their services, foods and beverages are not consistent!

• we gave them an outstanding score for the 1st night we had our dinner there, however 2nd night were a different story: “lack of attention on the services and few menu items written were not available” :(

• their breakfast menu is "quite" standard [polite way] as it's not appetizing, cold meal with no taste and limited choices.

Overall,...
Great hotel for short stay in Bangka, value for money with limited expectation on their eatery..
title: Hidden Gem at Unexpected Location

text:
The hotel was restored from its former old Dutch building. Much of the items from the past was preserved such as Italian terrazzo and the 200 year old stairs with wood that is no longer available.

The design was a mixed of modern but does not overwhelm and honor the integrity and charm of the old building. White clean decor, lots of photos of old Bangka makes this place a good stay.

I stayed at the Junior Suite which is quite spacious with comfortable bed and pillow. Great FREE wifi throughout the facility. 

They tried to immerse lots of Bangka local ingredients and food in their food and beverage. Its quite rare that hotels pay attention like this.
title: Awesome boutique hotel with heritage concept

Je recommande vivement.

text:
ビーチ付きホテルがどこも満室だったため、口コミ評価の高いここに泊まりました。ホテルは白を基調におしゃれにシックにまとまって、心地よい滞在となりました。宿泊客が多く、翌朝の朝食は７時ころにレストランに行ったにもかかわらずたくさんの食べ物が品切れ状態。客が多いときは早めに行かないとおいしいものは残っていないでしょう。
夕食も同じレストランでFish and Chips, Hainaese Chicken Rice（海南鶏飯シンガポールチキンライス）, Sirloin Steak 子供にCrispy Thin Pizzaを注文。ステーキは硬くて微妙。子供に頼んだビザはパブリカのの厚めの千切りが山盛りで、結局ほとんど食べませんでした。子供用には不向き。 海南鶏飯のごはんはベチャベチャで、鶏肉の臭みが強く、ピザの代わりに食べようとした子供も一口でやめたくらい、匂いがきつくおいしくなかった。ソーダウォーターに使われていた輪切りレモンからも変な匂いが・・・。味に過度な期待しなければ、おしゃれでいいレストランです。
ホテルはＡＴＲＩＵＭローカルマーケット、ラマヤナモール、ＢＴＣバンカトレーディングセンター（ショッピングセンター）のすぐそば。便利だがホテルから海までは車で１時間。中国の寺、ウミガメ保護センター、ポタニカルガーデン、シーフードレストラン、観光にも連れて行ってもらったけど特に感激したものはなかったし、海辺に休暇に来たかったので、次回はビーチ付きホテルに泊まりたい。ちなみにビーチホテルはタンジュンペソナ、パライビーチリゾート両方お金払って遊びに行きましたが、断然パライビーチリゾートのビーチがよかったです。高いだけある。海は乳濁した水色、晴れていたらきっと楽しめるでしょう。タンジュンペソナのビーチは岩ばかりで高波が打ちつけて危険すら感じました。
title: 市場の目の前。夕食のレストランの味は平均以下。
